author: sf
msg: Force base 10 when parsing the Content-Length. It doesn't matter in this
case, but in general using strto*(..., 0) for parsing HTTP headers is a bug.

msg: First unregister listener on deselect then release resources

author: sf
msg: Consistently use base 10 for numbers when parsing config options. It may be
confusing to the user if some directives treat a number with leading zero as
